In England, in the seven days to 16 February, there were 72,340 new confirmed cases (128.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 February, there were 94,717 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 24% (22,377 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 February is 3,605,373 (6,405.3 cases per 100,000 population).
